channel.title: How do I make prayer work?
channel.description: I've been searching for a way to code prayer into my server.. I can level it up and stuff but the prayers do not work.. they don't show icons but they still drain.. just doesn't show it draining until it's 0... please someone post a tutorial or something :( I've been searching for a TUT but couldn't find one. :confused: :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2008, 06:34:53 pm[/size][hr]Please..... I'm dying irl of lucemia or whatever.. so the faster someone answers the better LOL :( i'm dying here :( :eek: :( :mad: :eek:

item.title: How do I make prayer work?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Kyle_Arson:

I know enough about coding to code a server… me and my friend made a server better than most of the shitty ones on mopar server status in less than a week… i just would like a tut for adding prayers or something holy fuck how hard can this be to get!?? DO NOT REPLY TO THIS UNLESS YOU HAVE A TUT FOR PRAYER OR A LINK TO IT OK?? DON’T FREAKIN POST ABOUT MY POSTS!!

I highly doubt you know anything about coding. Coding a server isn’t a big deal. “wow you know how to edit”.
You don’t know crap enough about shit to do this. Don’t try.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make prayer work?

item.title: How do I make prayer work?
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

This is the kind of question that is ruining these forums. You HAVE NOT posted ANYTHING that you have previously tried. Read the damn rules and quit asking to be spoon fed. Learn some basic java. Learn how the buttons work and you should be able to figure it out. I’m nowhere near a java pro, and I could make a good prayer framework in an hour or less.

Figure out how the buttons work. Find the prayer button id and start from there. Don’t come here with nothing and expect to leave satisfied.

Read full topic

I’m lost here. And no, I’m not dying, but thanks for the advice. :eek:
